overview: Not even the heaviest tasks or the cruelest punishments can take away the young girl's hope. To her new friends, she tells magical stories about a little princess separated from her dear father. However, when her father is presumed dead, a real adventure begins. Orphaned and penniless, she has her noble heart and strong spirit as her only weapon. Sarah embarks on an epic journey in search of her father who might not be dead! Magic, mystery and songs will envelop everyone in an incredible adventure.
tagline: Orphaned and penniless, she has her noble heart and strong spirit as her only weapon.
title: The Little Princess
